comments:
i2005030108000 Daniela

I had org.eclipse.osgi v20050215a iin my workspace and was comparing with
v20050114. Got an internal error after switching into change sets mode on the
sync view. 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 2005-03-02 12:57:25.820
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Synchronize View: Processing label
changes".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException

Trying to use older builds as a workaround, I verified that the problem happens
also in M4 and in M5.

Still using M4, I tried the opposite: having the older version in my workspace
(v20050114) and comparing it with a newer version. This way the problem does not
happen. I guess this might work with recent builds as well, but I haven't tried yet.
